attributes.action: Make it illegal to drive away after hitting a cat
attributes.additional_details: My 1 year old cat was killed by a car and they never bothered to stop. Thankfully a passer by handed him to vets and we were contacted. You wouldn’t hit a dog and leave them on the road so why should it be different for a cat!
attributes.background: Driver must stop and report that they have hit a cat.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make it a requirement to report hitting a cat whilst driving
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566080
